FLOSS tabling at Holiday Peace Fair
When: December 4th, 2010, 10-4
Where: Campbell United Methodist Church
Who: Makers, crafters, cooks, musicians, parents, and kids

What: A group of us will be tabling for FLOSS, GNU/Linux (including Ubuntu and other distros), demoing & giving out free FLOSS disks, and literature, answering questions, providing tech support, etc.
